articles.title: FAQ
articles.contents:
Where can I stay?
Bear Creek Mountain Resort 101 Doe Mountain Ln, Macungie, PA 18062 
610-682-7100
To reserve a room in our hotel block, use this booking link. 
This hotel will be serviced by a shuttle to and from the wedding.

Homewood Suites by Hilton Allentown-West/Fogelsville 7686 Industrial Blvd #100, Allentown, PA 18106 
610-336-4860
To reserve a room in our hotel block, use this booking link. 
This hotel will be serviced by a shuttle to and from the wedding.

How do I get to Macungie, PA?
Ourbus has routes that cover locations for most of our guests. The closest bus stop to Macungie is Allentown - Wescosville, PA.
Guests looking to carpool can check out this Google Sheets form to see if another guest is departing from your location. If you are willing and able to pick up guests, please add your info to this Google Sheets form.

What is the dress code?
Guests are encouraged to dress in cocktail attire.

What are the parking options?
The venue has a parking lot that we can use during the event. Those staying in our hotel blocks can opt in to a shuttle service when we mail invitations.

articles.title: J I N A & L E S L I E
RSVP
articles.contents:
RSVP by November 7, 2024 using this form.
Please enter the first and last name of one member of your party. If you’re responding for you and a guest (or your family), you’ll be able to RSVP for your entire group.

articles.title: LZ_has_three_cats
articles.contents:
How did we meet?
J: We sat down next to each other in our English literature class the first semester of college. We’ve been stuck together since. Leslie still proofreads my emails and essays!
L: I walked up to Jina and went “How you doin’?”

How did the proposal go down?
J: I came to Pittsburgh to visit Leslie and we had a game night at our friend Monique’s apartment. It was a Pokemon-themed game night and there was even a Pokemon-version Monopoly board! We played for a while and when it became my turn, I landed on the Chance spot. I went to draw a card but instead, Leslie picked one for me. It was a Pokémon card that said, “Will you marry me? If you say yes, then you will gain a player two forever.”
L: We played board games.

Who asked whom out first?
J: For the record, I asked Leslie out first.
L: See Leslie’s response to question #1.

What is our favorite trait about the other person?
J: He makes me feel loved and secure.
L: She feels like home.

Name one quirky trait/memory about each other.
J: I have so many I could list off for Leslie. He might not look like it, but Leslie loves all things that are cute, especially animals. We went to a destination wedding last year and he spent most of the time petting and feeding the stray cats and dogs. We also traveled to Japan recently and he brought a bag of cat food so he could feed any stray cats.
L: Jina used Glare. It’s super effective!

What is our favorite Pokémon?
J: Too many to pick, but definitely between Eevee, Riolu, or Latios.
L: Squirtle
